ExtendedSection.Title: Content specific localization of the content editor

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
The appearence of the content editor of OpenCms relies heavily on the structure of your content. In particular, the form based editor shows all the schema elements of your content as an editor field. Such a field has a label and optionally a tooltip. Furthermore, the editor can have tabs, whose lables can also be localized.

The keys for such localization have to follow a special name scheme.
